description: This file defines a design-time factory class for creating the Entity Framework Core DbContext, specifically for use with tooling such as 'dotnet ef'. It provides a way to instantiate the database context with default options, using SQLite as the database provider.

classes.name: DesignTimeDbContextFactory
classes.description: A factory class to create instances of AppDbContext at design time for tooling operations.

methods.name: CreateDbContext
methods.description: Creates and configures an instance of AppDbContext with SQLite connection for design-time operations.
